column5: anyone have any suggestion on how to catch leeches. we see them all the time deer horn lodge when on the beaches having shore lunches. there must be more than just the ones we see and are able to catch by hand.they work well for walleye and are very durable on the hook.

A gunny sack with bloody meat like Liver in it works good or you can go to upfishing.com and click on Angling Tips and then click Procuring Leeches, there they will show you the coffee can method for catching Leeches. They also show you how to separate the Horse Leeches from the bait Leeches.
